alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lorain; Mahoning; Medina; Portage; Summit; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 7:55AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect Portage...Trumbull... northern Mahoning...southern Geauga...Cuyahoga...northeastern Medina...Summit and northeastern Lorain Counties Until 900 AM EDT.... At 752 AM EDT, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from Elyria to Farrell, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile and light accumulations on roadways... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Akron, Youngstown, Lorain, Elyria, Warren, Medina, Ravenna, Parma, Lakewood, Cuyahoga Falls, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Boardman, Brunswick, Westlake, North Royalton, North Ridgeville, Kent and Solon. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 301, 302, 303, 304, 305, 306, 307, 308, 309, 310, 311, 316, 317, 318, 319, 321, 322, 323, 324, 325, 327, 328, 329, 606, 607, 613, 614, 615, 616, 617, 619, and 620.
